value.title: Freedom On The Net Report Highlights Dangers Of AI
value.excerpt: According to Freedom House’s new report, Freedom on the Net 2023: The Repressive Power of Artificial Intelligence, governments are using automated systems to ramp up online censorship, while distributors of disinformation are using AI tools to fabricate images, audio and text.
